description: It's nice to have a native Plex client for Linux. Playback uses mpv so I haven't noticed any format compatibility issues. The main thing it's missing is proper support for music libraries with an album view etc, but for basic viewing of TV and movies it works well.

...because it forces transcode on most media formats. Nice idea and a great, clean UI but the transcoding kills my Plex NAS. The Plex Media Player uses MVP for playback which means no transcode and it's now available for Ubuntu. Get it instead.

My Plex Server doesn't have the fastest cpu so I needed a client for linux that would allow me to completely disable video transcoding and this app it perfect for that. The layout is very simple and intuitive and in some places I like it more than the Plex client apps for Windows and MacOS. The only reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because there does not seem to be a way enable subtitles. But that is a small price to pay for such a increase in performance to my server after disabling video transcoding. Highly recommended!
Even with the plex server on my local network it is a pain to watch load. No errors or problems I ran into and it looks great but I cant see myself using it due to how slow it is.

Well, I got it to working, noticed my server was down for some reason. It is ways faster than the web browser version or the native for Windows. But dark mode doesn't want to work, I turned it off and on again, it is still bright.
I really love that someone made a GTK-based Plex desktop app. I'm impressed overall. It works pretty well!
Provided a valid login/password combination, it sees the server (named it), but says it fails to login to it. Loses login info.
I really like the GTK4 interface, pretty clean. Could be simplified a little bit, but overall very solid application. Wish it supported multiple profiles.
Not a replacement for the Plex Linux player. Very feature light and crashes every time I launch a title. Needs MUCH more work.

It works and does what it should, but it does not allow easy OAuth login, and the Layout is a bit confusing. Logging in with the Token worked easily but i think i'll stick to the browser app as the navigation is more familiar.
summary: Works, but i prefer the web browser over this

description: Die übersichtliche Oberfläche fügt sich sehr gut in Gnome ein.
L'application fonctionne bien et permet même de synchroniser les playlists, ce que ne permettent ni l'application W10 ni le client Plex pour linux

Ce n'est pas compliqué, c'est un des lecteurs Plex les plus stable, complet et fonctionnel. Les options sont claires (merci pour la possibilité de facilement désactiver le transcodage), mais il manque une option de "zoom" ou format d'affichage vidéo, car avec un écran ultrawide ce n'est pas très pratique de devoir remuxer les films mal encodés.
